Package com.izforge.izpack.gui

Interface Summary
LayoutConstants Interface with some constants used by or for the IzPanelLayout.
 

Class Summary
AutomatedInstallScriptFilter Allows a file if it is a directory or if it ends with .xml.
ButtonFactory This class makes it possible to use default buttons on macosx platform
EtchedLineBorder Draws an etched line border.
FlowLayout A flow layout arranges components in a left-to-right flow, much like lines of text in a paragraph.
HighlightJButton A button that highlights when the button passes over.
IconsDatabase The icons database class.
IzPackKMetalTheme Deprecated.
IzPackMetalTheme Deprecated.
IzPanelConstraints Constraints class for the layout manager IzPanelLayout.
IzPanelLayout This is a special layout manager for IzPanels.
IzPanelLayout.FillerComponent Component which will be used as placeholder if not extern component will be set or as filler for struts.
LabelFactory A label factory which can handle modified look like to present icons or present it not.
LabelFactory.FullLineLabel This class is only needed to signal a different layout handling.
TwoColumnConstraints The constraints class to use with TwoColumnLayout.
TwoColumnLayout This class implements a layout manager that generally lays out components in two columns.
